title: downloading client
body: i just bought a new laptop, whenever I try to download it, it will get to 75% but it keeps dropping the percentage

replies.body: Grats on your new laptop?  Since getting it, have you updated your Windows and drivers?  It's important to run it as a first step to make sure that the installer has all of the products and components it needs to install smoothly.  For now, I would leave it alone unless you're running into any errors.  Let me know if it's still an issue!
